name: gangly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A person, usually a boy or young man, who is very tall and thin and moves awkwardly: a gangly youth

Animal physiology: thin or slender (of people)

tall, thin, and awkward in movement: Susan showed up with a tall, gangly boy.
